  i   e   =   U   T   F   8   &amp;a   m   p   ;   n   o   d   e   =   1   0   1   2   6   9   4   3   0   1   1   "       c   l   a   s   s   =   "   n   a   v   -   a   "   &gt;   s   p   a   n       c   l   a   s   s   =   "   n   a   v   -   a   -   c   o   n   t   e   n   t   "   &gt;   G   l   o   b   e       a   n   d       M   a   i   l       B   e   s   t       S   e   l   l   e   r   s   /   s   p   a   n   &gt;   /   a   &gt;       a       h   r   e   f   =   "   /   b   e   s   t   -   b   o   o   k   s   -   o   f   -   t   h   e   -   m   o   n   t   h   /   b   /   r   e   f   =   s   v   _   b   _   5   /   1   7   5   -   2   0   3   1   9   5   0   -   6   1   2   3   1   4   8   ?    s   c   r   i   p   t       t   y   p   e   =   "   t   e   x   t   /   j   a   v   a   s   c   r   i   p   t   "   &gt;

  b   r   e   a   k   }   }   }   r   e   t   u   r   n       e   }   v   a   r       m   s   e   c   S   t   a   r   t   =   f   u   n   c   t   i   o   n       m   s   s   e   c   v   (   )   {   v   a   r       a   =   d   o   c   u   m   e   n   t   .   c   r   e   a   t   e   E   l   e   m   e   n   t   (   "   d   i   v   "   )   ;    (   f   u   n   c   t   i   o   n   (   a   )   {   v   a   r       b   =   d   o   c   u   m   e   n   t   .   u   e   _   b   a   c   k   d   e   t   e   c   t   ;   b   &amp;&amp;b   .   u   e   _   b   a   c   k   &amp;&amp;a   .   u   e   &amp;&amp;(   a   .   u   e   .   b   f   i   n   i   =   b   .   u   e   _   b   a   c   k   .   v   a   l   u   e   )   ;   a   .   u   e   t   &amp;&amp;a   .   u   e   t   (   "   b   e   "   )   ;   a   .   o   n   L   d   E   n   d   &amp;&amp;(   w   i   n   d   o   w   .   a   d   d   E   v   e   n   t   L   i   s   t   e   n   e   r   ?   w   i   n   d   o   w   .   a   d   d   E   v   e   n   t   L   i   s   t   e   n   e   r   (   "   l   o   a   d   "   ,   a   .   o   n   L   d   E   n   d   ,   !   1   )   :   w   i   n   d   o   w   .   a   t   t   a   c   h   E   v   e   n   t   &amp;&amp;w   i   n   d   o   w   .   a   t   t   a   c   h   E   v   e   n   t   (   "   o   n   l   o   a   d   "   ,   a   .   o   n   L   d   E   n   d   )   )   ;   a   .   u   e   h   &amp;&amp;a   .   u   e   h   (   0   ,   w   i   n   d   o   w   ,   "   l   o   a   d   "   ,   a   .   o   n   L   d   ,   1   )   ;   a   .   u   e   &amp;&amp;a   .   u   e   .   t   a   g   &amp;&amp;(   a   .   u   e   _   f   u   r   l   &amp;&amp;a   .   u   e   _   f   u   r   l   .   s   p   l   i   t   ?    (   f   u   n   c   t   i   o   n   (   g   ,   h   )   {   f   u   n   c   t   i   o   n       d   (   a   ,   d   )   {   v   a   r       b   =   {   }   ;   i   f   (   !   e   |   |   !   f   )   t   r   y   {   v   a   r       c   =   h   .   s   e   s   s   i   o   n   S   t   o   r   a   g   e   ;   c   ?   a   &amp;&amp;(   "   u   n   d   e   f   i   n   e   d   "   !   =   =   t   y   p   e   o   f       d   ?   c   .   s   e   t   I   t   e   m   (   a   ,   d   )   :   b   .   v   a   l   =   c   .   g   e   t   I   t   e   m   (   a   )   )   :   f   =   1   }   c   a   t   c   h   (   g   )   {   e   =   1   }   e   &amp;&amp;(   b   .   e   =   1   )   ;   r   e   t   u   r   n       b   }   v   a   r       b   =   g   .   u   e   |   |   {   }   ,   a   =   "   "   ,   f   ,   e   ,   c   ,   a   =   d   (   "   c   s   m   t   i   d   "   )   ;   f   ?   a   =   "   N   A   "   :   a   .   e   ?   a   =   "   E   T   "   :   (   a   =   a   .   v   a   l   ,   a   |   |   (   a   =   b   .   o   i   d   |   |   "   N   I   "   ,   d   (   "   c   s   m   t   i   d   "   ,   a   )   )   ,   c   =   d   (   b   .   o   i   d   )   ,   c   .   e   |   |   (   c   .   v   a   l   =   c   .   v   a   l   |   |   0   ,   d   (   b   .   o   i   d   ,   c   .   v   a   l   +   1   )   )   ,   b   .   s   s   w   =   d   )   ;   b   .   t   a   b   i   d   =   a   }   )   (   u   e   _   c   s   m   ,   w   i   n   d   o   w   )   ;   
   
   /   s   c   r   i   p   t   &gt;   
   s   c   r   i   p   t       t   y   p   e   =   '   t   e   x   t   /   j   a   v   a   s   c   r   i   p   t   '   &gt;   
   (   f   u   n   c   t   i   o   n   (   b   ,   c   )   {   v   a   r       a   =   c   .   i   m   a   g   e   s   ;   a   &amp;&amp;a   .   l   e   n   g   t   h   &amp;&amp;b   .   u   e   .   c   o   u   n   t   (   "   t   o   t   a   l   I   m   a   g   e   s   "   ,   a   .   l   e   n   g   t   h   )   }   )   (   u   e   _   c   s   m   ,   d   o   c   u   m   e   n   t   )   ;   
   
   /   s   c   r   i   p   t   &gt;   
   s   c   r   i   p   t       t   y   p   e   =   '   t   e   x   t   /   j   a   v   a   s   c   r   i   p   t   '   &gt;   
   (   f   u   n   c   t   i   o   n   (   c   ,   d   )   {   v   a   r       b   =   c   .   u   e   ,   a   =   d   .   n   a   v   i   g   a   t   o   r   ;   b   &amp;&amp;b   .   t   a   g   &amp;&amp;a   &amp;&amp;(   a   =   a   .   c   o   n   n   e   c   t   i   o   n   |   |   a   .   m   o   z   C   o   n   n   e   c   t   i   o   n   |   |   a   .   w   e   b   k   i   t   C   o   n   n   e   c   t   i   o   n   )   &amp;&amp;a   .   t   y   p   e   &amp;&amp;b   .   t   a   g   (   "   n   e   t   I   n   f   o   :   "   +   a   .   t   y   p   e   )   }   )   (   u   e   _   c   s   m   ,   w   i   n   d   o   w   )   ;   
   
   /   s   c   r   i   p   t   &gt;   
   s   c   r   i   p   t       t   y   p   e   =   "   t   e   x   t   /   j   a   v   a   s   c   r   i   p   t   "   &gt;   
   (   f   u   n   c   t   i   o   n   (   c   ,   d   )   {   f   u   n   c   t   i   o   n       l   (   a   ,   b   )   {   f   o   r   (   v   a   r       c   =   [   ]   ,   d   =   0   ;   d   a   .   l   e   n   g   t   h   ;   d   +   +   )   {   v   a   r       e   =   a   [   d   ]   ,   f   =   b   .   e   n   c   o   d   e   (   e   )   ;   i   f   (   e   [   h   ]   )   {   v   a   r       g   =   b   .   m   e   t   a   S   e   p   ,   e   =   e   [   h   ]   ,   l   =   b   .   m   e   t   a   P   a   i   r   S   e   p   ,   k   =   [   ]   ,   m   =   v   o   i   d       0   ;   f   o   r   (   m       i   n       e   )   e   .   h   a   s   O   w   n   P   r   o   p   e   r   t   y   (   m   )   &amp;&amp;k   .   p   u   s   h   (   m   +   "   =   "   +   e   [   m   ]   )   ;   e   =   k   .   j   o   i   n   (   l   )   ;   f   +   =   g   +   e   }   c   .   p   u   s   h   (   f   )   }   r   e   t   u   r   n       c   .   j   o   i   n   (   b   .   r   e   s   o   u   r   c   e   S   e   p   )   }   f   u   n   c   t   i   o   n       r   (   a   )   {   v   a   r       b   =   a   [   h   ]   =   a   [   h   ]   |   |   {   }   ;   b   [   s   ]   |   |   (   b   [   s   ]   =   c   .   u   e   _   m   i   d   )   ;   b   [   t   ]   |   |   (   b   [   t   ]   =   c   .   u   e   _   s   i   d   )   ;   b   [   f   ]   |   |   (   b   [   f   ]   =   c   .   u   e   _   i   d   )   ;   a   =   "   /   /   "   +   c   .   u   e   _   f   u   r   l   +   "   /   1   /   "   +   a   [   u   ]   +   "   /   1   /   O   P   /   "   +   a   [   v   ]   +   "   /   "   +   a   [   w   ]   +   "   /   "   +   l   (   [   a   ]   ,   x   )   ;   i   f   (   k   )   t   r   y   {   k   .   c   a   l   l   (   d   [   n   ]   ,   a   )   }   c   a   t   c   h   (   g   )   {   c   .   u   e   .   s   b   f   =   1   ,   (   n   e   w       I   m   a   g   e   )   .   s   r   c   =   a   }   e   l   s   e   (   n   e   w       I   m   a   g   e   )   .   s   r   c   =   
   a   }   f   u   n   c   t   i   o   n       p   (   )   {   g   &amp;&amp;g   .   i   s   S   t   u   b   &amp;&amp;g   .   r   e   p   l   a   y   (   f   u   n   c   t   i   o   n   (   a   ,   b   ,   c   )   {   a   =   a   [   0   ]   ;   b   =   a   [   h   ]   =   a   [   h   ]   |   |   {   }   ;   b   [   f   ]   =   b   [   f   ]   |   |   c   ;   r   (   a   )   }   )   ;   c   .   u   e   .   i   m   p   r   e   s   s   i   o   n   =   r   ;   g   =   n   u   l   l   }   i   f   (   !   (   1   c   .   u   e   i   n   i   t   )   )   {   v   a   r       h   =   "   m   e   t   a   d   a   t   a   "   ,   w   =   "   i   m   p   r   e   s   s   i   o   n   T   y   p   e   "   ,   u   =   "   f   o   r   e   s   t   e   r   C   h   a   n   n   e   l   "   ,   v   =   "   p   r   o   g   r   a   m   G   r   o   u   p   "   ,   s   =   "   m   a   r   k   e   t   p   l   a   c   e   I   d   "   ,   t   =   "   s   e   s   s   i   o   n   "   ,   f   =   "   r   e   q   u   e   s   t   I   d   "   ,   n   =   "   n   a   v   i   g   a   t   o   r   "   ,   y   =   c   .   u   e   _   b   l   i   ,   k   =   d   [   n   ]   &amp;&amp;d   [   n   ]   .   s   e   n   d   B   e   a   c   o   n   ,   q   =   f   u   n   c   t   i   o   n   (   a   ,   b   ,   c   ,   d   )   {   r   e   t   u   r   n   {   e   n   c   o   d   e   :   d   ,   r   e   s   o   u   r   c   e   S   e   p   :   a   ,   m   e   t   a   S   e   p   :   b   ,   m   e   t   a   P   a   i   r   S   e   p   :   c   }   }   ,   x   =   q   (   "   "   ,   "   ?   "   ,   "   &amp;"   ,   f   u   n   c   t   i   o   n   (   a   )   {   r   e   t   u   r   n       l   (   a   .   i   m   p   r   e   s   s   i   o   n   D   a   t   a   ,   z   )   }   )   ,   z   =   q   (   "   /   "   ,   "   :   "   ,   "   ,   "   ,   f   u   n   c   t   i   o   n   (   a   )   {   r   e   t   u   r   n       a   .   f   e   a   t   u   r   e   N   a   m   e   +   "   :   "   +   l   (   a   .   r   e   s   o   u   r   c   e   s   ,   
   A   )   }   )   ,   A   =   q   (   "   ,   "   ,   "   @   "   ,   "   |   "   ,   f   u   n   c   t   i   o   n   (   a   )   {   r   e   t   u   r   n       a   .   i   d   }   )   ,   g   =   c   .   u   e   .   i   m   p   r   e   s   s   i   o   n   ;   y   &amp;&amp;u   e   .   i   m   p   r   e   s   s   i   o   n   (   {   p   r   o   g   r   a   m   G   r   o   u   p   :   "   c   s   m   "   ,   i   m   p   r   e   s   s   i   o   n   T   y   p   e   :   "   a   c   t   i   o   n   "   ,   i   m   p   r   e   s   s   i   o   n   D   a   t   a   :   [   {   f   e   a   t   u   r   e   N   a   m   e   :   "   c   s   m   -   f   e   a   t   u   r   e   s   "   ,   r   e   s   o   u   r   c   e   s   :   [   {   i   d   :   "   i   m   p   r   e   s   s   i   o   n   -   t   r   a   c   k   i   n   g   "   }   ]   }   ]   ,   m   e   t   a   d   a   t   a   :   {   c   s   m   :   1   }   ,   f   o   r   e   s   t   e   r   C   h   a   n   n   e   l   :   "   a   c   t   i   o   n   -   i   m   p   r   e   s   s   i   o   n   s   "   }   )   ;   k   ?   p   (   )   :   (   u   e   .   a   t   t   a   c   h   (   "   l   o   a   d   "   ,   p   )   ,   u   e   .   a   t   t   a   c   h   (   "   b   e   f   o   r   e   u   n   l   o   a   d   "   ,   p   )   )   ;   d   .   P   &amp;&amp;d   .   P   .   r   e   g   i   s   t   e   r   &amp;&amp;d   .    /   s   c   r   i   p   t   &gt;   
   /   b   o   d   y   &gt;
